summary_text: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.

name: Dealer
summary_text: A drug dealer spends his last day alive pedaling around Budapest visiting friends and clients.

name: Boeing Boeing
summary_text: A man dates three air hostesses simultaneously with the help of his friend. Works like a charm in the start but things start to crumble which leads to a series of funny events.

summary_text: A family of sadistic butchers has dug into the back country and, from the deep freeze of winter to the dog days of summer, anyone who crosses their path is dead meat.

name: Siberia

name: Unknown World
